name: Thumblisher
description:
The easiest way to resize and scale your frames for different social media platforms.


Plugin Demo:

Thumblisher Video Tutorial


Expand your frames to the following Social Media Image Sizes :

Facebook: Profile, Cover, Post, Event, Ad, Story cover, Group cover.

Instagram: Profile, Post, Story, Ad, Thumbnails, IGTV.

Twitter: Profile, Cover, Post, Card, Ad

LinkedIn: Logo, Cover, Hero, Business Banner, Dynamic Ads.

YouTube: Cover Desktop, Cover Mobile, Display ads, Overlay ad, Companion banner ads, Dynamic Ads.

Pinterest: Profile, Board Display, Standard Pin, Overlay ad, Companion banner ads, Dynamic Ads.

TikTok: Profile.

Dribbble: Shot, Shot HD.

Producthunt: Thumbnail, Gallery.

Google Play: Portrait, Landscape.

App Store: Portrait, Landscape.


To use this plugin

  1. First, select your frame or image
  2. Choose the social media image size you’d like to generate for
  3. Click the “Create” button
